tool_description: Evaluates structural fire resistance, materials, and building design factors affecting fire spread.

construction_type.description: Building construction classification (Type I, II, III, IV, or V)

fire_rated_assemblies.description: List of fire-rated wall/floor assemblies with ratings

compartmentalization.description: Whether building has proper fire compartmentalization

renovation_history.description: Years of major renovations affecting structure

error_messages: Invalid construction type: Use standard types (Type I, Type II, Type III, Type IV, Type V).
Fire rating format error: Specify ratings as 'Assembly-HourRating' (e.g., 'Wall-2hr', 'Floor-1hr').
Compartmentalization assessment required: Specify true or false for fire compartmentalization status.
Renovation year error: Years must be realistic (1800-current year).
usage: Provide construction_type, fire_rated_assemblies, and compartmentalization status. Include atrium_present and renovation_history for comprehensive structural analysis.

fire_spread_risk.description: Risk level for fire spread (low, moderate, high, critical)

vulnerable_areas.description: Building areas with structural fire vulnerabilities
